channel.title: kubecon on Andy Roberts
channel.description: Recent content in kubecon on Andy Roberts

item.title: KubeCon & CloudNative Con North America 2024
item.description: Well, the last week has been a whirlwind as I was fortunate to attend KubeCon + CloudNativeCon in Salt Lake City, Utah. Being based in New Zealand means we have few choices for conferences, so being able to attend KubeCon for the first time was a real eye opener. Flying into Salt Lake City after 27 hours of travel from New Zealand, the snowcapped peaks of the Wasatch Mountains were a real treat.
